00093                 destWords = e.insertSentence(destLine);
00094

00096                 aligObj->nextSentence(srcLine.size(), destLine.size());

00098                 // get phrases
00099                 unsigned int i1=0,i2=0;
00100                 for (unsigned int j1 = 0; j1<srcLine.size(); j1++)
00101                 {
00102                         for (unsigned int j2 = i1; j2<srcLine.size(); j2++)
00103                         {
00104                                 i1 = aligObj->getMinTargetAlig(j1, j2);
00105                                 i2 = aligObj->getMaxTargetAlig(j1, j2);
00106                                 if (aligObj->getMinSrcAlig(i1, i2) == j1 && aligObj->getMaxSrcAlig(i1, i2) == j2)
